title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear in the Available Items section.
EB: In the Available Items section, when expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon, the expected behavior is that the table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and go to the Available Items section.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
4. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
